scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd shopping-cart-badge && npm i" "cd shopping-cart-card && npm i" "cd container && npm i" "cd event-store && npm i" "cd product-list && npm i" "cd tracking && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd shopping-cart-badge && npm start" "cd shopping-cart-card && npm start" "cd container && npm start" "cd product-list && npm start" "cd tracking && npm start"
